content.value: public void Cancel()

children.summary: Call to request that the current run be cancelled. Note that cancellation may not be instantaneous, and even after cancellation has been acknowledged, you can expect to receive all the cleanup-related messages.

children.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources asynchronously.

parameters.description: The message from the message bus

return.description: Return true to continue running tests, or false to stop.

children.summary: Set to get real-time notification of test output (for xUnit.net v2 tests only). Note that output is captured and reported back to all the test completion Info>s in addition to being sent to this Info>.

Public Sub Start(startOptions As AssemblyRunnerStartOptions = Nothing)

children.summary: Starts running tests. This call returns immediately, and status results are dispatched to the events on this class. Callers can check to find out the current status.

Public ReadOnly Property Status As AssemblyRunnerStatus

children.summary: Gets the current status of the assembly runner

children.summary: Set to be able to filter the test cases to decide which ones to run. If this is not set, then all test cases will be run.

content.value: public static AssemblyRunner WithAppDomain(string assemblyFileName, string? configFileName = null, bool shadowCopy = true, string? shadowCopyFolder = null)
Public Shared Function WithAppDomain(assemblyFileName As String, configFileName As String = Nothing, shadowCopy As Boolean = True, shadowCopyFolder As String = Nothing) As AssemblyRunner

parameters.description: If set to true, runs tests in a shadow copied app domain, which allows tests to be discovered and run without locking assembly files on disk.
The path on disk to use for shadow copying; if null, a folder will be automatically (randomly) generated

children.summary: Creates an assembly runner that discovers and run tests in a separate app domain.

content.value: public static AssemblyRunner WithoutAppDomain(string assemblyFileName)
Public Shared Function WithoutAppDomain(assemblyFileName As String) As AssemblyRunner

children.summary: Creates an assembly runner that discovers and runs tests without a separate app domain.

summary: A class which makes it simpler for casual runner authors to find and run tests and get results.

content.value: public class AssemblyRunner : IAsyncDisposable, IMessageSink
Public Class AssemblyRunner Implements IAsyncDisposable, IMessageSink
